personal.name: Durgesh Kumar
personal.tagline: Building scalable web applications with modern technologies

about.description: Passionate Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience building modern web applications. Specialized in MERN stack with a focus on creating scalable, user-friendly solutions. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful interfaces.
highlights: Strong focus on clean code & best practices

projects.title: Real-Time-Poll-Rooms
projects.description: A full-stack real-time polling web application that allows users to create polls, share unique links, and collect live votes with instant result updates using WebSockets. Built for high performance, seamless user experience, and scalable real-time data synchronization.

projects.title: QR-Genrator
projects.description: A fast and lightweight web tool that generates QR codes instantly from text, URLs, or custom input. Designed with a clean UI and optimized backend processing for quick generation and easy download/share functionality.

projects.title: Restobook
projects.description: A restaurant booking and management web platform that allows users to explore restaurants, check availability, and reserve tables online. Includes real-time booking updates, user-friendly dashboard, and efficient reservation management for both customers and restaurant owners.

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: Real-time weather application with location-based forecasts and interactive maps.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Leading development of scalable web applications using MERN stack. Mentoring junior developers and implementing best practices.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained multiple client projects using React and Node.js.
